data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Dnipropetrovs'k.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dnipropetrovs‘k, Ukraine
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, help the 125,982 believers in Dnipropetrovs'k to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 3,350,217 lost friends and neighbors.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 27 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 125,982 believers in the state of Dnipropetrovs'k to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Dnipropetrovs‘k, Ukraine.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Kazakh people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Kazakh people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Kazakh people is yours.
Spirit, please convict the believers in Dnipropetrovs‘k, Ukraine to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Father, move the 125,982 believers in the state of Dnipropetrovs'k to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Dnipropetrovs‘k, Ukraine need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

location.name: Dnipropetrovs'k
location.cities_list: Dnipro, Kryvyy Rih, Kamyanske, Nikopol, Pavlohrad
location.cities_list_w_pop: Dnipro (998,103), Kryvyy Rih (624,579), Kamyanske (233,358), Nikopol (110,669), Pavlohrad (105,238)
